channel.title: News on Andaze Ltd.
channel.description: Recent content in News on Andaze Ltd.

item.title: Renewal of Corporate Website
item.description: Thank you for visiting the website of Andaze Ltd. We have made a major renewal of our website starting June 2022. In this renewal, we have reviewed the design and page structure, and added new contents. We will continue to make further improvements and provide useful information so that many of you will be able to use our website.
